title: How did covid become actually deadly all of a sudden?

body: The host dying is a by product of the birthing of new viruses.
body_html: The host dying is a by product of the birthing of new viruses.

post.title: How did covid become actually deadly all of a sudden?

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
But they adapt over time to become weaker so they *don't* kill the host and can live and reproduce longer. This is why the initial outbreak in Wuhan was so much worse than everywhere else.

Until a week ago, apparently. I honestly feel like they released a second version of the virus. There's no other explanation for how it suddenly became a real threat. I know people who had it, most likely myself too, and I know people who work hospitals. And until now, all of them said it was nothing, and that they barely even got sick (except stronger in a few cases) and that hospitals had plenty of resources. But now, overnight almost all people who get it are becoming sicker than they could ever imagine, and hospitals are overflowing, and I can confirm this as well. From the same virus that barely caused a fever for most people just a week ago. Interestingly this also applies to the flu, which is also now becoming very deadly which was rare before a week ago. I have no idea how that's even possible.
body_html:
But they adapt over time to become weaker so they don't kill the host and can live and reproduce longer. This is why the initial outbreak in Wuhan was so much worse than everywhere else.

Until a week ago, apparently. I honestly feel like they released a second version of the virus. There's no other explanation for how it suddenly became a real threat. I know people who had it, most likely myself too, and I know people who work hospitals. And until now, all of them said it was nothing, and that they barely even got sick (except stronger in a few cases) and that hospitals had plenty of resources. But now, overnight almost all people who get it are becoming sicker than they could ever imagine, and hospitals are overflowing, and I can confirm this as well. From the same virus that barely caused a fever for most people just a week ago. Interestingly this also applies to the flu, which is also now becoming very deadly which was rare before a week ago. I have no idea how that's even possible.

post.title: How did covid become actually deadly all of a sudden?

body: Viruses *do* become deadlier, particularly if they've become more virulent (the second wave of Spanish Flu was far more murderous than the first.) It happens, nature is fickle
body_html: Viruses do become deadlier, particularly if they've become more virulent (the second wave of Spanish Flu was far more murderous than the first.) It happens, nature is fickle

body:
Also fake and gay is all.  They've just beefed up control of the narrative and block the info.  Meanwhile their congregation is now double down existentially invested in their con so they can enlarge the lie. 

Also it's winter and everyone's been sedentary, isolated, depressed and stressed from disorder and economic ruin.  The weak will die.

Also fake and gay is all. They've just beefed up control of the narrative and block the info. Meanwhile their congregation is now double down existentially invested in their con so they can enlarge the lie.

Also it's winter and everyone's been sedentary, isolated, depressed and stressed from disorder and economic ruin. The weak will die.

body: I know they spread more but I don't recall actually *getting it* to be worse. If it kills more people it's just because more people had it in general. But this time it really seems like the actual symptoms in most people morphed from a mild flu to a serious illness literally overnight.
body_html: I know they spread more but I don't recall actually getting it to be worse. If it kills more people it's just because more people had it in general. But this time it really seems like the actual symptoms in most people morphed from a mild flu to a serious illness literally overnight.
